Hi {!Review__c.Interviewer__c},
I would like to confirm you that, we have scheduled an interview for a candidate for {!Review__c.Position__c}. Please be available to take the interview. Below are the details of your interview:
When:{!Review__c.Interview_Date__c}
Where: [full address, e.g. 33 Farnsworth Street, 4th Fl, Boston, MA 02210 - if necessary, include a link with the specific location on the map and/or directions]
Who:{!Review__c.Job_Application__c}
Feel free to contact me via email or at [e.g. 1-444-555-2222], if you have any questions.
All the best / Kind regards,
[Your name]
[Signature]
